seed_pair.target: Porque ha estado jugando en el barro.
seed_pair.known: Because he has been playing in the mud.

S0538: No quiero parecer como si no me importara.
I don't want to seem as though I don't care.
S0540: No me importa si quieres irte sin el coche.
I don't mind if you want to leave without the car.
S0541: Es una buena idea intentar respirar despacio.
It's a good idea to try and breathe slowly.
S0542: Cuando sea que te sientas enojado.
S0544: Quien sea que dijo que sería difícil tenía absolutamente razón.
Whoever said it would be difficult was absolutely right.
S0545: Es tu turno de llevar la ropa limpia arriba.
It's your turn to take the clean clothes upstairs.
S0546: El perro está sucio y mojado.
The dog is dirty and wet.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
